entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters, a Triwizard champion.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends and a clever student.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is also a Auror.

entities.name: skeeter woman
entities.description: A journalist who has been causing trouble for the wizarding community.

entities.name: binns
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who teaches History of Magic.

relationships.description: Hermione thinks she has an idea to catch the Skeeter woman.
Harry is a student in Binns's class.
Ron thinks Hermione must really hate the Skeeter woman to risk missing an exam.
Hermione wants to go to the library for two seconds.
